name: Far Out (Raining Sideways)
description:
You're stuck in your space ship with a broken transmitter. The nightmare has come true... You're unable to order take out! Point and click your way around your adorable space ship, fix your transmitter, and order your dinner. This game was made during the 2018 Global Game Jam, the theme for which was Transmission.

Click on objects to interact with them, picking them up, starting a puzzle, or getting a description. Click on items in your inventory to select them, then click on another object to use it, on another item in your inventory to combine them, or on the background to deselect it.

This game was also featured in the Nice Games Club episode on the Global Game Jam. The section talking about this game starts at about 8:25

I did some of the programming as and designed the "instance" puzzles that open up on top of the rest of the screen.

GGJ: https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/far-out

Nice Games Club: http://nicegames.club/2018/02/global-game-jam-2018-special/
